short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your new tab into a kanban board that helps you focus. The only extension with multiple boards and sync across computers.

FAQs
Where is my data stored? If you stop working on the app, will I lose my data?
- All of your data is securely kept in chrome.storage.local on your own device or if you use Sync Across Devices, within your Google account through chrome.storage.sync. Even if I stop working on the app, you would be able to continue using this app with no data loss until either Google stops being a company, or they make a sudden change to Chrome that would break 80% of Chrome Extensions.

Contact me at swekage@gmail.com or submit a support request with any bug reports or questions.
